title: Power Type
description:
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
Type: 'origins:modify_insomnia_ticks'
- Modifies the value used for calculating when a Phantom will spawn for a player.

modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will be applied to the value.

modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to the value.
